hero.title: Anand Prakash
hero.subtitle: Event Sales & F&B Coordinator
hero.description: Hospitality management graduate from IHM Mumbai with execution-focused exposure in event sales coordination, F&B operations, and client servicing.

about.title: Precision Meets Passion
about.subtitle: The Narrative
about.description:
Hospitality management graduate from IHM Mumbai with strong execution-focused exposure in event sales coordination, F&B operations, and client servicing within premium hospitality environments.

Demonstrated ability to handle mid to large-scale corporate and social events with on-ground ownership, commercial awareness, and service quality control.

journey.title: B.Sc. Hotel Management
journey.description: Academic focus on Event Management, F&B Service, Hospitality Sales, and Revenue Management. NCHMCT affiliated.

journey.title: Operations Intern
journey.description: Supported front office operations and multi-outlet F&B operations ensuring SOP adherence.

journey.title: Event Management Intern
journey.description: Assisted luxury events team in planning and execution of large-scale corporate and brand events.

journey.title: Outlet Manager Intern
journey.description: Managed breakfast service operations at SOMA outlet during peak hours. Hystar Award winner.

journey.title: Event Sales & Ops Coordinator
journey.description: Managing sales-to-execution lifecycle for premium corporate and social events. Handling clients like Amazon and Krafton.

events.title: Nandi Hills Full-day Event
events.description: High Tea, Lunch & Dinner coordination for a full-day corporate retreat. Managed logistics and service delivery.

events.title: Satva Northland Corporate Dinner
events.description: Executed a structured corporate dinner event focusing on professional service and timeline management.

events.title: Harley-Davidson Model Launch
events.description: Supported logistics and banquet coordination for a major product launch during Grand Hyatt internship.

events.title: Cocktail Reception & Birthdays
events.description: Managing intimate gatherings and social celebrations with focus on personalized service.

interests.title: Indian Railways
interests.description: An encyclopedic knowledge of train routes and a passion for the engineering marvel of Indian Railways.

interests.title: Culinary Explorer
interests.description: Curating a journey through India's diverse cuisines via YouTube, finding inspiration for F&B trends.

interests.title: Strategic Observer
interests.description: Analyzing cricket and logistics with the same precision and strategic mindset.
